mapper.select: SELECT u.USER_NICKNAME AS nickname, n.NOTICE_ID, n.NOTICE_TITLE, n.NOTICE_CONTENT,n.NOTICE_CREATED_DATE FROM GGHJ_USER u JOIN GGHJ_UNI uni ON u.USER_ID = uni.USER_ID JOIN GGHJ_NOTICE n ON uni.UNI_ID = n.USER_ID UNION ALL SELECT k.kakao_nickname AS nickname, n.NOTICE_ID, n.NOTICE_TITLE, n.NOTICE_CONTENT,n.NOTICE_CREATED_DATE FROM GGHJ_KAKAO k JOIN GGHJ_UNI uni ON k.kakao_id = uni.KAKAO_ID JOIN GGHJ_NOTICE n ON uni.UNI_ID = n.USER_ID ORDER BY NOTICE_ID DESC
SELECT U.USER_NICKNAME, N.NOTICE_ID, N.NOTICE_TITLE, N.NOTICE_CONTENT, N.NOTICE_CREATED_DATE, U.USER_ID FROM GGHJ_NOTICE N JOIN GGHJ_USER U ON N.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE N.NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GGHJ_NOTICE (NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, USER_ID) VALUES(#{noticeId},#{noticeTitle},#{noticeContent},#{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_TITLE , USER_ID FROM GGHJ_NOTICE N JOIN GGHJ_UNI U ON N.USER_ID = U.USER_ID ORDER BY NOTICE_ID DESC
